tags.name: Databases
tags.description: API endpoints for managing databases within an organization.

tags.name: Database branch passwords
tags.description: API endpoints for managing database branch passwords.

tags.name: Deploy requests
tags.description: API endpoints for managing database deploy requests.

get.description:
### Authorization
A   OAuth token must have the following   scopes in order to use this API endpoint:

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| User | `read_organizations` |

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the page offset of returned results

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the number of returned results

200.description: Gets the organizations for the current user

get.description:
### Authorization
A service token or OAuth token must have the following access or scopes in order to use this API endpoint:

**Service Token Accesses**
 `read_database`, `delete_database`, `write_database`, `read_branch`, `delete_branch`, `create_branch`, `delete_production_branch`, `connect_branch`, `connect_production_branch`, `delete_branch_password`, `delete_production_branch_password`, `read_deploy_request`, `create_deploy_request`, `approve_deploy_request`, `read_comment`, `create_comment`

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `read_databases` |

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization the database belongs to

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the page offset of returned results

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the number of returned results

200.description: Retrieves the databases for an organization

| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `create_databases` |

parameters.name: organization

get.description:
### Authorization
A service token or OAuth token must have the following access or scopes in order to use this API endpoint:

**Service Token Accesses**
 `read_branch`, `delete_branch`, `create_branch`, `connect_production_branch`, `connect_branch`

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `manage_passwords` |
| Database | `manage_passwords` |
| Branch | `manage_passwords` |

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The name of the branch the password belongs to

parameters.name: database
parameters.description: The name of the database the password belongs to

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization the password belongs to

parameters.name: read_only_region_id
parameters.description: A read-only region of the database branch. If present, the password results will be filtered to only those in the region

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the page offset of returned results

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: If provided, specifies the number of returned results

200.description: Gets the passwords for the database branch

post.description:
### Authorization
A service token or OAuth token must have the following access or scopes in order to use this API endpoint:

**Service Token Accesses**
 `connect_production_branch`, `create_branch_password`

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `manage_passwords` |
| Database | `manage_passwords` |
| Branch | `manage_passwords` |

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The name of the branch the password belongs to

parameters.name: database
parameters.description: The name of the database the password belongs to

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization the password belongs to

role.description: The database role of the password (i.e. admin)

ttl.description: Time to live (in seconds) for the password. The password will be invalid when TTL has passed

read_only_region_id.description: A read-only region of the database branch

### Authorization A service token or OAuth token must have the following access or scopes in order to use this API endpoint: **Service Token Accesses** `read_deploy_request` **OAuth Scopes** | Resource | Scopes | | :------- | :---------- | | Organization | `read_deploy_requests` | | Database | `read_deploy_requests` |

delete.description:
### Authorization

**Service Token Accesses**
 `delete_database`

**OAuth Scopes**

patch.description:
### Authorization
A service token or OAuth token must have the following access or scopes in order to use this API endpoint:

**Service Token Accesses**
 `write_database`

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `write_databases` |
| Database | `write_database` |

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the database

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization the database belongs to

automatic_migrations.description: Whether or not to copy migration data to new branches and in deploy requests.

migration_framework.description: A migration framework to use on the database

migration_table_name.description: Name of table to use as migration table for the database

require_approval_for_deploy.description: Whether or not deploy requests must be approved by a database administrator other than the request creator

restrict_branch_region.description: Whether or not to limit branch creation to the AWS us-east-1 region.

allow_data_branching.description: Whether or not data branching is allowed on the database

insights_raw_queries.description: Whether or not full queries should be collected from the database

production_branch_web_console.description: Whether or not the web console can be used on the production branch of the database

default_branch.description: The default branch of the database

200.description: Returns the updated database

**OAuth Scopes**

 | Resource | Scopes |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Organization | `read_databases` |
| Database | `read_database` |

grant_type.description: Whether an OAuth grant code or a refresh token is being exchanged for an OAuth token

code.description: The OAuth grant code provided to your OAuth application's redirect URI. Required when grant_type is authorization_code

redirect_uri.description: The OAuth application's redirect URI. Required when grant_type is authorization_code

refresh_token.description: The refresh token from the original OAuth token grant. Required when grant_type is refresh_token
